sentences.sentence: "I am extraordinarily impressed by the improvements we have witnessed," says Randy Jacobs, a Southern California-based lawyer who has had to evacuate both his home and business to escape wildfires.
sentences.translation: 南加州的律师兰迪·雅各布斯不得不从野火中疏散自己的家庭和企业，他说：“我们看到的改善情况让我印象非常深刻。”

sentences.sentence: A man named Randy in Canada liked to hunt for trees.
sentences.translation: 加拿大有个叫兰迪的人喜欢搜寻树木。
